ing: 1 tablespoon finely chopped green bell pepper
des: "Low fat and filling. I use imitation crab in this, but it also works well with lobster, real crab and shrimp. For a tangy flavor, add 1 teaspoon mustard."
ins: In a medium bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, sugar, salt, vinegar and milk.  Add the crabmeat, celery and green pepper and stir until evenly combined.  Refrigerate until ready to use.
